009package Ch09_AutomaticThresholding;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.threshold.global.GlobalThresholder;
017import imagingbook.common.threshold.global.IsodataThresholder;
018
019/**
020 * Demo plugin showing the use of the {@link IsodataThresholder} class.
021 * 
022 * @author WB
023 * @version 2022/04/02
024 */
025public class Global_Isodata implements PlugInFilter {
026
027        @Override
028        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
029                return DOES_8G;
030        }
031
032        @Override
033        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
034                ByteProcessor bp = (ByteProcessor) ip;
035                
036                GlobalThresholder thr = new IsodataThresholder();
037                int q = thr.getThreshold(bp);
038                
039                if (q > 0) {
040                        IJ.log("threshold = " + q);
041                        bp.threshold(q);
042                }
043                else {
044                        IJ.showMessage("no threshold found");
045                }
046        }
047}
